data.eml:eml: Contribution to the knowledge of Saprinus Erichson, 1834 of forensic relevance from Lebanon (Coleoptera, Histeridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shayya, Salman, Degallier, Nicolas, Nel, Andre, Azar, Dany, Lackner, Tomas (2018): Contribution to the knowledge of Saprinus Erichson, 1834 of forensic relevance from Lebanon (Coleoptera, Histeridae). ZooKeys 738: 117-152, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.738.21382, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.738.21382
